meanings.definition: Euryoky: the state or quality of being wide or broad
meanings.sent1: The euryoky of the field allowed for many games to be played at once.
meanings.sent2: The euryoky of the ocean was breathtaking as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent3: The euryoky of the room made it perfect for a dance party with friends.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as euryoky as the horizon at sunset, spreading warmth to all.
meanings.sent5: The euryoky of the canyon made it a popular spot for hikers seeking adventure.

meanings.definition: Euryoky: a wide or broad expanse or area
meanings.sent1: The forest was a euryoky of green, with tall trees reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent2: The euryoky of the desert seemed endless under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: The euryoky of the park was perfect for a picnic with family and friends.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a euryoky of ideas, each one branching out in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The euryoky of the sky at night was filled with twinkling stars, a sight to behold.
